EmailTemplate.name: Netapp Follow up - Reminder to Reg.NonReg..Registrant Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar Reminder Tomorrow: NetApp ONTAP and VMTurbo: Aligning Virtualization with Storage – Live Demo
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}},
We look forward to having you join us tomorrow for the webinar, NetApp ONTAP and VMTurbo: Aligning Virtualization with Storage – Live Demo.The link to the meeting in your preferred timezone appears below. In advance of the session, feel free to contact us http://bit.ly/1gGVikz with any questions you’d like addressed. There will also be a live Q&A session following the presentation.
Link to the meeting at your preferred time:
Tuesday, November 19, 10:00 AM EST http://bit.ly/17vxGfW Tuesday, November 19, 12:00 PM EST http://bit.ly/HfqeZX
Sincerely, Jonathan Reeve VMTurbo
